text: @realDonaldTrump @Facebook That’s the best you got for Obama? How about when you said Mexico would pay for the wall? Or you had Coronavirus under control? I could LITERALLY post all day long shit you lie about! Can’t wait till booted from WH and are hit with a LONG list of indictments!
